item.title: Firefox 'Shake to Summarize' Webpage Feature Uses Apple Intelligence
item.description: Firefox for iOS 26 will get a new “Shake to Summarize” feature that generates an AI summary of a webpage when iPhone users shake their device. The feature uses the on-device language models that power
